nodes.text: The Endar Rebirth was a Republic survey vessel in service during the Cold War. It was the first ship to investigate Taris, devastated by orbital bombardment three centuries previous, as a candidate for resettlement by the Republic.
The ship was later destroyed over Taris, with only a handful of its crew escaping to the planet below. The survivors lived in the wilderness for five years before being rescued by Republic agents.

The Endar Rebirth was first mentioned in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, serving as part of the backstory for a quest on the planet Taris. No details concerning the vessel's class or history beyond its destruction were given.
